title: Mumbai student bags gold medal at Int'l Earth Science Olympiad
content:
*New Delhi:* Neel M Karia, a student from Mumbai, bagged a gold medal at International Earth Science Olympiad, which was recently held in Brazil. 
Karia, student of Bhavani Shankar Junior College, was one of the nine gold medallists at the intern ational competition held between September 13 to 20 in the South American ...
